text: Étienne Fouvry is a French mathematician working primarily in analytic number theory. In 1985, Fouvry showed that the first case of Fermat's last theorem is true for infinitely many primes. == External links == * Videos of Étienne Fouvry in the AV-Portal of the German National Library of Science and Technology ==References== Category:French mathematicians Category:Paris-Sud 11 University faculty Category:Living people Category:Number theorists Category:École Normale Supérieure alumni Category:1953 births
title: Étienne Fouvry
